WRITING.TITLE: The Six Nations must stay on Freeview TV
WRITING.TEXT:
I thought I would just put this post here as I remember a while ago there were posts saying that there was interest from companies such as Sky Sports to get the rights to host the coverage. Source: [Telegraph](http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-wales-33463368)
I feel it is so important that this tournament stays on freeview. The amount of people that end up watching these games while flicking through the channels is astounding. Every weekend in February and March I hear people of all ages and genders mentioning that they enjoyed the game. I feel if Sky Sports, BT Sport or another pay per view company took hold of the tournament then that feeling of buzz and excitement would recede somewhat.
I understand Freeview has the rights until around 2021 however I fear for the future.
As someone who has a particular love for montages. This kind of promo is exactly what you look to achieve. So well timed and balanced!
Shamelessly using this photo on my Facebook page
If Carlsberg did centres...
I think there are a few images in [this](https://www.reddit.com/r/rugbyunion/comments/5oi7db/anybody_able_to_photoshop_a_poster_for_a_rugby/) selection that warrant inclusion.
Never seen this before. Amazing to see!
Cheers mate will use all of these!

WRITING.TITLE: Alright you scallywags. It's competition time and you could win some lovely Lions stash worth over 100!
WRITING.TEXT:
Alright well I'm sure a lot of you saw the post from yesterday asking about a poster for a giveaway.
Well we got there and [here](http://i.imgur.com/aTWZUGE.jpg) it is.
This giveaway is mainly designed to promote my montage channel on Facebook! [Here's the Facebook page where I will be hosting the giveaway.](https://www.facebook.com/RugbyRulesShowcase/). And here is my [youtube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC7_eeX1snxFbnZ4bGOYpMKQ).
Some of the items I shall be giving away to one lucky winner are...
[Item 1](http://www.lovell-rugby.co.uk/Rugby-T-Shirts/Canterbury/British-and-Irish-Lions-2017-Kids-Cotton-Rugby-Training-T-Shirt-Tango-Red) [Item 2](http://www.lovell-rugby.co.uk/Rugby-T-Shirts/Canterbury/British-and-Irish-Lions-2017-Players-Rugby-Training-Singlet-Tango-Red) [Item 3](http://www.lovell-rugby.co.uk/Rugby-Hat/Canterbury/British-and-Irish-Lions-2017-Bobble-Rugby-Beanie-Tango-Red) [Item 4](http://www.lovell-rugby.co.uk/Rugby-Shorts/Canterbury/British-and-Irish-Lions-2017-Match-Day-Rugby-Shorts-Bright-White)
To enter-
*Like + Share the Facebook Post with #rugbyrules
*Like Rugby Rules Homepage
Competition Closes Thursday 19th January 11:59pm Winner announced Friday 20th January!!
Link to Facebook Page:https://www.facebook.com/RugbyRulesShowcase/
Good luck lads hope you get involved.

WRITING.TITLE: Thank you for the advice on being a scout.
WRITING.TEXT: Saw a couple of days ago that there was a post on scouts PTO'ing more often. I was guilty of being a hill camper recently but I took the advice to switch from a sniper to a carbine and the results have been phenomenal. I have been top scorer on the last 3-4 games now and it's thanks to you.

To the people asking why this is not really an issue. This never usually is an issue however it is different when it comes to a page like In the Loose. THESE PAGES PROFIT from posts like these going viral in some way or another. People who post or reshare onto this sub just do it for fun but ITL ultimately want to make money out of it. That is why it is wrong.
